Base render target. Used by windows and framebuffer objects.

Imports

drawparams, gl, pixeltypes, program_base, uniform

Types

Drawable = concept x
    x.draw(OpenGl)

UniformSource = concept x
    for k, v in getUniforms(x):
      k is string
      v is Uniform

proc draw[D: Drawable; U: UniformSource](target: Target; program: Program; arrays: D;
                                     uniforms: U; params: DrawParams)
Draw vertices to the target, using the given shader program, using vertices from the given Drawable (most commonly a MeshSlice), passing the uniforms from the provided source to the shader program.   Source Edit
